plugins.name: HYWD Style Unifier
plugins.description:
Unify style parameters throughout your figma layout for better design consistency. Convert your intuitively designed first layouts into propper yet highly effective design systems. Or just fix your final design with your existing styles. Find inconsistencies or unlinked elements easily. Swap themes or incorporate external components and adapt them to your local or global styles in a breeze.


Here is a quick intro video on what the plugin can do for you!


And here are video-tutorials on the 3 main use cases:


Best workflow for design system building


Best workflow for design linting


Best workflow for style matching



Get even more details on how to use the tool and a FREE trial license at our HAYWOOD Digital Tools online shop and the figma style unifier plugin product page!

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
plugins.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas‚Äîno overlap required.


Features

‚Ä¢ Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

‚Ä¢ Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title‚Äîperfect for design system docs or style guides.

‚Ä¢ No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

‚Ä¢ Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Faizan ‚Äì Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.description: Hey there! I‚Äôm a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


‚Äî



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai
plugins.tagline: Revolutionize your designs with AI-powered text generation

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you‚Äôre ready to streamline your design process!

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.

plugins.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
plugins.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It‚Äôs perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you‚Äôre working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
plugins.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision ‚Äî organize your designs by the spectrum

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etc‚Ä¶)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figma‚Äôs built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

It‚Äôs just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 ‚Äî and for that, we got you covered


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Fix Detached Instances [PRO Feature]

Preview and fix all detached instances within your files.

  1. Find all detached instances across pages
  2. Preview of the original component versus the detached instance
  3. Link instance to original component
  4. Maintain all manual overrides


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose ‚ÄúAll Layers‚Äù to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voil√†. Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click ‚ÄúSelect All‚Äù to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] ‚Äï Find all text layers with the font ‚ÄúInter‚Äù and font weight ‚ÄúSemi Bold‚Äù
  2. [Simple] ‚Äï Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] ‚Äï Find all instances of a component named ‚ÄúButton‚Äù that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] ‚Äï Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] ‚Äï Find all instances of an external library component named ‚ÄúInput‚Äù that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] ‚Äï Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters ‚Äúes‚Äù


In short, the possibilities are endless


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. It‚Äôs slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If you‚Äôre not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever it‚Äôs launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to ‚ÄúManage‚Äù and select ‚ÄúRemove all connectors‚Äù. This will delete all connectors you‚Äôve added on this page


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that i‚Äôm planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.


Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è

plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

‚Ä¢Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

‚Ä¢Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

‚Ä¢Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

‚Ä¢Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the ‚ÄúShow Component Highlight‚Äù button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the ‚ÄúLocate‚Äù button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click ‚ÄúHide Component Highlight.‚Äù


Notes

‚Ä¢The highlighted components are based on the plugin‚Äôs interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

‚Ä¢The plugin‚Äôs results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

136415.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

‚Ä¢Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

‚Ä¢Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

‚Ä¢Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

‚Ä¢Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the ‚ÄúShow Component Highlight‚Äù button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the ‚ÄúLocate‚Äù button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click ‚ÄúHide Component Highlight.‚Äù


Notes

‚Ä¢The highlighted components are based on the plugin‚Äôs interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

‚Ä¢The plugin‚Äôs results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

131547.release_notes:
Import Settings
------------------------------------
New options allow for custom pin dimensions or automatic framing based on the exact dimensions of original Pinterest pin images.

Persistent Authorization
------------------------------------
The plugin now retains your Pinterest authorization between sessions, so you no longer need to reauthorize each time.

Pinterest Account Management
------------------------------------
You can now unlink your Pinterest account from the plugin, making it easier to switch between multiple accounts as needed.

Additional Improvements
------------------------------------
The interface has been reorganized with separate tabs for Boards and Import Settings to improve usability. Clearer status messages offer better feedback during the import process. Authorization errors and expired tokens are now handled more gracefully with automatic recovery.
131547.tagline: Seamless import your Pinterest boards into Figma

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


üéØ Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


üé® Flexible Options:

‚Ä¢ Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


üîç Smart Selection:

‚Ä¢ Apply to selected elements only

‚Ä¢ Include all children elements

‚Ä¢ Preserve component instances


üí° Perfect For:

‚Ä¢ Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

‚Ä¢ Cleaning up imported designs

‚Ä¢ Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

‚Ä¢ Standardizing measurements across teams


‚ö°Ô∏è Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the Figma Community

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer ‚Äî crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.
